title: Rengar vs Khazix
body: So with the new update and rengar having been changed. Is the Thrill of the Hunt still a thing? If so, how does it work now?

replies.body:
Kha still gets his 4th evolve.

If i recall from something i read, Rengar has a hidden 6th stack for his bone tooth, but this could be wrong as i'm going off memory.
